title: 1952년 Holland 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Holland. 판결일: 1952-12-03. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: HOLLAND v. STATE
**판결일**: 1952-12-03
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX

**판사**: Beauchamp

## 변호인

No attorney on appeal for appellant., George P. Blackburn, State’s Atty. Austin, for the State.

## 인용

- 253 S.W.2d 51

## 판결문 요약


BEAUCHAMP, Judge.
Appellant entered his plea of guilty on a charge of driving a motor vehicle while intoxicated. The court assessed his punishment at a fine of $150.
The record before us on appeal contains neither a statement of facts nor bill of exception. The proceedings appear regular and nothing is presented for review by this court.
The judgment is affirmed.
...
